targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    name, 
    type,
    timestamp, 
    value AS current, 
    NULL AS max_slots, 
    NULL AS erogation_power, 
    NULL AS availability, 
    NULL AS num_cars, 
    NULL AS traffic_level, 
    NULL AS avg_time, 
    NULL AS direction,
    latitude,
    longitude
FROM innovacity.temperatures 
WHERE type IN (${tipo_sensore}) 
  OR name IN (${nome_sensore}) 
UNION ALL
SELECT 
    name, 
    type,
    timestamp, 
    value AS current, 
    NULL AS max_slots, 
    NULL AS erogation_power, 
    NULL AS availability, 
    NULL AS num_cars, 
    NULL AS traffic_level, 
    NULL AS avg_time, 
    NULL AS direction,
    latitude,
    longitude
FROM innovacity.rain
WHERE type IN (${tipo_sensore}) 
  OR name IN (${nome_sensore})
UNION ALL
SELECT 
    name, 
    type,
    timestamp, 
    value AS current, 
    NULL AS max_slots, 
    NULL AS erogation_power, 
    NULL AS availability, 
    NULL AS num_cars, 
    NULL AS traffic_level, 
    NULL AS avg_time, 
    NULL AS direction,
    latitude,
    longitude
FROM innovacity.reservoirs
WHERE type IN (${tipo_sensore}) 
  OR name IN (${nome_sensore})
UNION ALL
SELECT 
    name, 
    type,
    timestamp, 
    value AS current, 
    NULL AS max_slots, 
    NULL AS erogation_power, 
    NULL AS availability, 
    NULL AS num_cars, 
    NULL AS traffic_level, 
    NULL AS avg_time, 
    NULL AS direction,
    latitude,
    longitude
FROM innovacity.air_pollution
WHERE type IN (${tipo_sensore}) 
  OR name IN (${nome_sensore})
UNION ALL
SELECT 
    name, 
    type,
    timestamp, 
    NULL AS current, 
    NULL AS max_slots, 
    erogation_power,
    availability,
    NULL AS num_cars, 
    NULL AS traffic_level, 
    NULL AS avg_time, 
    NULL AS direction,
    latitude,
    longitude
FROM innovacity.charging_station
WHERE type IN (${tipo_sensore}) 
  OR name IN (${nome_sensore})
UNION ALL
SELECT 
    name, 
    type,
    timestamp, 
    NULL AS current, 
    NULL AS max_slots, 
    NULL AS erogation_power, 
    NULL AS availability, 
    num_cars,
    traffic_level,
    avg_time,
    NULL AS direction,
    latitude,
    longitude
FROM innovacity.traffic
WHERE type IN (${tipo_sensore}) 
  OR name IN (${nome_sensore})
UNION ALL
SELECT 
    name, 
    type,
    timestamp, 
    value AS current, 
    NULL AS max_slots, 
    NULL AS erogation_power, 
    NULL AS availability, 
    NULL AS num_cars, 
    NULL AS traffic_level, 
    NULL AS avg_time, 
    direction,
    latitude,
    longitude
FROM innovacity.wind
WHERE type IN (${tipo_sensore}) 
  OR name IN (${nome_sensore})

UNION ALL
SELECT 
    name, 
    type,
    timestamp, 
    value AS current, 
    NULL AS max_slots, 
    NULL AS erogation_power, 
    NULL AS availability, 
    NULL AS num_cars, 
    NULL AS traffic_level, 
    NULL AS avg_time, 
    NULL AS direction,
    latitude,
    longitude
FROM innovacity.humidity
WHERE type IN (${tipo_sensore}) 
  OR name IN (${nome_sensore})

UNION ALL
SELECT 
    name, 
    type,
    timestamp, 
    value AS current, 
    NULL AS max_slots, 
    NULL AS erogation_power, 
    NULL AS availability, 
    NULL AS num_cars, 
    NULL AS traffic_level, 
    NULL AS avg_time, 
    NULL AS direction,
    latitude,
    longitude
FROM innovacity.ebikes
WHERE type IN (${tipo_sensore}) 
  OR name IN (${nome_sensore})

UNION ALL
SELECT 
    name, 
    type,
    timestamp, 
    value AS current, 
    NULL AS max_slots, 
    NULL AS erogation_power, 
    NULL AS availability, 
    NULL AS num_cars, 
    NULL AS traffic_level, 
    NULL AS avg_time, 
    NULL AS direction,
    latitude,
    longitude
FROM innovacity.eco_zone
WHERE type IN (${tipo_sensore}) 
  OR name IN (${nome_sensore})
ORDER BY timestamp DESC 
LIMIT ${limit}

list.definition: (SELECT name AS __text, name AS __value FROM innovacity.temperatures) UNION ALL (SELECT name AS __text, name AS __value FROM innovacity.rain) UNION ALL (SELECT name AS __text, name AS __value FROM innovacity.reservoirs)  UNION ALL (SELECT name AS __text, name AS __value FROM innovacity.air_pollution) UNION ALL (SELECT name AS __text, name AS __value FROM innovacity.ebikes) UNION ALL (SELECT name AS __text, name AS __value FROM innovacity.eco_zone) UNION ALL (SELECT name AS __text, name AS __value FROM innovacity.humidity) UNION ALL (SELECT name AS __text, name AS __value FROM innovacity.parking) UNION ALL (SELECT name AS __text, name AS __value FROM innovacity.charging_station) UNION ALL (SELECT name AS __text, name AS __value FROM innovacity.traffic) UNION ALL (SELECT name AS __text, name AS __value FROM innovacity.wind)

list.name: nome_sensore
